h1_title: How to Find All Buddha's Eyes Locations and Unlock Secret Boss
h2_title: How to Use the Buddha’s Eyeballs to Unlock the Secret Boss
content: If you haven’t got all 6 of the Buddha Eyes, when you go toward it and examine it, will say:_"Bound by six seals, eternally confined. In yellow earth, the evil’s fate entwined."_

If you haven’t got all 6 of the Buddha Eyes, when you go toward it and examine it, will say:_"Bound by six seals, eternally confined. In yellow earth, the evil’s fate entwined."_
